roleset.name: sell a representative example of a chain

example.name: no franchisee
example.text: Rally's operates and franchises about 160 fast-food restaurants throughout the U.S.
example.arg: about 160 fast-food restaurants throughout the U.S.

example.name: with franchisee
example.text: John franchised his highly lucrative dissertation-shredding business to hordes of hungry undergraduates.

roleset.note: FRANCHISE-V NOTES: I have a vague intuition that there's also a 'buy a franchise' sense,but I'll wait until an example shows up. (from franchise.01-v)
